name: European Federation of Investors and Financial Services Users
goal: The European Federation of Investors and Financial Services Users (Better Finance) is a not for profit non-governmental organization. It does not represent any commercial or business interests. Better Finance acts as an independent financial expertise center to the direct benefit of the European financial services users (end-users, consumers, retail investors, etc.) and other stakeholders of the European financial services who are independent from the financial industry. It federates national and international organisations representing the interests of individual investors and financial services users in Europe.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Shareholders Rights Directive, Capital Markets Union, IORPs, Single Market for Pensions in Europe, MiFID, PRIIPs,  IMD, FTT, ELTIFs, UCITs, Solvency
